location.text: Arc Synthetic Resin is obtained from Arc enemies (including Wasps and Hornets, with higher chances from tougher foes like Leapers, Shredders, and Queens) and by scavenging Arc wrecks such as Baron/Deforester Husks, Arc Couriers, and Arc Probes; PC Gamer notes Electromagnetic Storm as a strong farming condition due to many crashed Probes.
